title: Upsell to Higher Tier Based on Usage
description: A customer on the 'Pro' plan consistently hits their API usage limits. The Account Manager should upsell them to the 'Enterprise' plan.

tasks.description: Identify a customer who has exceeded their plan's API limits for the past 3 consecutive months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a suitable customer from a system report.

tasks.description: Calculate the amount the customer has been paying in overage fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the customer is paying more in overages than the cost of an upgrade.

tasks.description: Contact the customer and present a cost-benefit analysis showing how upgrading to the 'Enterprise' plan would save them money and provide higher limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a data-driven sales pitch and the customer agrees to upgrade.
